New Records: Ben Stokes passed 10,000 international runs across all formats
Key Match Events: Harry Brook was back off the bench but top-edged to deep square on 11
Moeen Ali added to his own argument that his and a few other 50-over careers should soon end
Pre-Game Insights: England, while now in the driving seat to at least claim a consolation prize, can scarcely say the same.
Pressure building for England's leadership pairing of Buttler and Matthew Mott
Post-Match Reflections: Buttler must have wondered if it was set to continue unbroken when he meekly chipped Paul van Meekeren to mid off for five

Stokes was 36 off 44 at this stage but after bringing up his half-century with hulking six, he went into overdrive and the Netherlands, much like Afghanistan during Glenn Maxwell’s hall-of-fame double century in Mumbai the night before, fell apart somewhat
Miscellaneous Highlights: England lifted Jos Buttler’s men off the bottom of the World Cup table
Jos Buttler’s men now in the driving seat to at least claim a consolation prize
